channel.title: Make your own band!
channel.description:
I saw this posted on /b/ (4chan) and thought it would be a fun game to play here on moparisthebest.com Basically follow the instruction to create your own band, please follow the rules other wise it just ruins the fun. _____________________________________________________________________________________________ [b] 1 - Go to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random That will bring up a random wikipedia page, the title of the article will be the name of your band. 2 - Go to http://www.quotationspage.com/random.php3 Scroll down and click "new random quotes" andthen: The last four words of the very last quote of the page is the title of your first album. 3 - Go to http://www.flickr.com/explore/interesting/7days/ Third picture, no matter what it is, will be your album cover. 4 - Go to the random name generator: http://www.kleimo.com/random/name.cfm Set Gender to Both. Set 'How Many?' equal to how many band members you wish to have. Set Obscurity Factor to tastes. 5 - Post your band info and album art here (Maybe write a review of your band?) [/b] _____________________________________________________________________________________________ Just to start us off I will make one, here goes:
Band name - Kiva Kahl First album - Within his own will Album art: [img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/2131251023_b125d7e8b9_m.jpg[/img] Band members names: 1. Arlen Arrospide 2. Marcellus Medin 3. Caloca 4. Douglass Lofts 5. Yun Goldrich

item.title: Make your own band!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I saw this posted on /b/ (4chan) and thought it would be a fun game to play here on moparisthebest.com
Basically follow the instruction to create your own band, please follow the rules other wise it just ruins the fun.

[b]
1 - Go to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random
That will bring up a random wikipedia page, the title of the article will be the name of your band.

2 - Go to http://www.quotationspage.com/random.php3
Scroll down and click “new random quotes” andthen:

The last four words of the very last quote of the page is the title of your first album.

3 - Go to http://www.flickr.com/explore/interesting/7days/

Third picture, no matter what it is, will be your album cover.

4 - Go to the random name generator:

http://www.kleimo.com/random/name.cfm

Set Gender to Both.
Set ‘How Many?’ equal to how many band members you wish to have.
Set Obscurity Factor to tastes.

5 - Post your band info and album art here (Maybe write a review of your band?)
[/b]

Just to start us off I will make one, here goes:

Band name - Kiva Kahl First album - Within his own will Album art: [img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/2131251023_b125d7e8b9_m.jpg[/img] Band members names: 1. Arlen Arrospide 2. Marcellus Medin 3. Caloca 4. Douglass Lofts 5. Yun Goldrich

Read full topic
